website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a very nice school instrument, this trumpet is going to be worth your money.
pros: Capable of producing a really beautiful sound
Good looking silver finish on this horn
Matches trumpets that are much more expensive
Classic, professional looking case does a good job of protecting the horn
cons: While this trumpet plays easily for a beginner, the cost point might be more suited for an intermediate student

customer_reviews.title: Not made in Japan
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet was made in China. It’s not a Japanese made trumpet like their Q&A says.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Small

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice trumpet and has worked well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in her second year in high school. She has played since 6th grade and really wanted a trumpet of her own. This is a very nice trumpet and has worked well. Came with a nice hard case as well. Very satisfied. Have had it for a month so far and will try to update my review later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely immaculate smooth trumpet. We had a friend, who is a professional trumpeter, look at this and he was absolutely blown away by the price we paid. Worth the cost. Japan makes excellent top quality products and this is by far amazing.
customer_reviews.author: bicyclepunk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My sons trumpet instructor saw and heard this trumpet today during his lesson. When I told him where we bought and the price, his jaw actually dropped open. This instrument was extremely well packed. Beautiful case. Obviously brand new and in plastic covers. Could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryan Lail

customer_reviews.title: you just need to clean it and it's perfect again.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her trumpet. After one year, she still loves it. The blackish tarnish sometimes, you just need to clean it and it's perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: Mhel

customer_reviews.title: Very good post beginner trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: Two of my sons used this trumpet to make district honor band. One of them continued to use for high school marching band and jazz band. Had no problem with the valves- If the valves stick, you might want to try oiling them as is required of any trumpet!
customer_reviews.author: E-ReaderTechieGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet was just as described. It was delivered before the actual expected delivery date. I bought this for my teenage daughter, and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Thurston

customer_reviews.title: great trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son needed for school. Mine came in a brown hard case with mouthpiece.
customer_reviews.author: NC shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: the yamaha has good tone and valve action. i looks good. i think the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel W. Needleman

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is terrible, craftsmanship is lacking and the item is way over priced
customer_reviews.author: BAD MOFO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. The instrument has worked perfectly from day one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The instrument has worked perfectly from day one. Brand new and in perfect shape. So far my son has used it for 3 months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Good Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Great trumpet, 3rd valve keeps getting stuck no matter how much valve oil I put and the trumpet had some blemishes in the silver that won't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My son barely dropped this after having it a week ...
customer_reviews.text: My son barely dropped this after having it a week and I had to pay $75 to fix the valves.
customer_reviews.author: Starbucks

product_meta.title: Yamaha Trumpet Bb YTR 2330S Standard SILVER With "Semi-Hard case"
product_meta.description: Yamaha Trumpet Bb YTR 2330S Standard SILVER With Hard case

Bore size: ML Shape / Other Bell: YL-ll Bell
